metadata.title: EI-6 Integration Verification: Full Test Suite

objective.value: Verify that the full QMS CLI test suite passes with all CR-095 changes: attachment classification, terminal state checkout guard, cascade close, auto-metadata generation, block rendering, attribution placement, and step subsection numbering
objective.author: claude

pre_conditions.value: qms-cli repository checked out on branch cr-095 at commit 31f8306. Python 3.x with pytest installed. All CR-095 implementation changes committed: qms_config.py, commands/checkout.py, commands/close.py, interact_compiler.py, seed/templates/TEMPLATE-VR.md, tests/test_interact_compiler.py, tests/test_interact_parser.py, tests/test_attachment_lifecycle.py.
pre_conditions.author: claude

step_instructions.1.value:
Run the full test suite from the qms-cli directory:
cd qms-cli && python -m pytest tests/ -v --tb=short
step_instructions.1.author: claude

step_expected.1.value: All 673 tests pass with 0 failures. No errors, no warnings related to CR-095 changes. Specifically: test_attachment_lifecycle.py (16 tests), test_interact_compiler.py (58 tests including 14 new CR-095 tests), and test_interact_parser.py (49 tests with updated v5 assertions) all pass.
step_expected.1.author: claude

step_actual.1.value:
======================= 673 passed in 511.95s (0:08:31) =======================

All 673 tests passed. Breakdown of CR-095-relevant test files:
- tests/test_attachment_lifecycle.py: 16 passed
- tests/test_interact_compiler.py: 58 passed
- tests/test_interact_parser.py: 49 passed
No failures, no errors, no warnings.
step_actual.1.author: claude

summary_narrative.value: Full QMS CLI test suite executed on cr-095 branch (commit 31f8306) covering all CR-095 changes. 673 tests passed in ~8.5 minutes with zero failures. The 30 new tests specifically verify: attachment document classification (5), terminal state checkout guard (4), cascade close logic (3), attachment close flexibility (2), interactive auto-compile (2), block rendering (5), auto-metadata generation (6), and step subsection numbering (3). Existing tests were updated for TEMPLATE-VR v5 changes (version assertions, prompt list, node count). No unexpected behavior observed.
summary_narrative.author: claude
